name: Everhelm
description:
Welcome to Everhelm, a magical world full of wildlife and characters. This project is my final major project for my University Degree, which reflects my favourite things about game and level design. At this point the game is nothing more than a small tech demo that shows of the worlds i will be working on over the next few months.

While this is something ive wanted to make for a long period of time, there will be other projects i will be working on in the meantime. But i will always come back and work on Everhelm
